data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 2, Jumpei Iida signals a Shonan throw-in in Kashima's half.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Shonan.
In the minute 4, In Kashima, Temma Matsuda of Shonan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
Jumpei Iida signals a throw-in for Shonan, close to Kashima's area.
In the minute 5, Shonan to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Temma Matsuda of Shonan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
In the minute 7, Daiki Kaneko for Shonan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Free kick Kashima.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
In the minute 11, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Kashima.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Shonan.
Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Kashima push forward at Kashima Soccer Stadium and Everaldo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Shonan defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
In the minute 19, Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Shonan have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Shonan.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 25, Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Kashima.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In the minute 27, Kashima have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Kashima drive upfield and Ryuji Izumi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Shonan defender.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 29, Jumpei Iida signals a Kashima throw-in in Shonan's half.
Kashima drives forward and Ryota Nagaki gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
In the minute 31, Jumpei Iida signals a Kashima throw-in in Shonan's half.
Jumpei Iida awards Shonan a goal kick.
Jumpei Iida awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, Kashima to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Throw-in Shonan.
Ryotaro Araki for Kashima drives towards goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shonan's Hirokazu Ishihara gets in a shot on goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Shonan have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
Shonan needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 40, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At Kashima Soccer Stadium, Kei Koizumi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Kashima.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Kashima.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shonan's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
In the minute 45, Jumpei Iida blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Free kick in a good position for Kashima!
In the minute 47, Takuya Okamoto (Shonan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Everaldo (Kashima) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Jumpei Iida awards Shonan a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 49, Tomoya Inukai (Kashima) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Shonan at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Shonan at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In the minute 56, Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kashima.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Shonan's Naoki Ishihara is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Shonan.
Throw-in for Shonan at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 63, Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Itsuki Someno is replacing Yasushi Endo for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Throw-in Kashima.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Kashima.
Shonan are pushing forward but Mitsuki Saito's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
In the minute 68, Kashima's Everaldo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Jumpei Iida awards Shonan a goal kick.
Kashima make their second substitution with Shintaro Nago replacing Leo Silva.
In the minute 70, Zago (Kashima) is making a third substitution, with Juan Alano replacing Ryotaro Araki.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 73, In Kashima, Itsuki Someno (Kashima) misses the target with a header.
Shonan have a goal kick.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
In the minute 74, Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Kashima.
Jumpei Iida signals a Kashima throw-in in Shonan's half.
In the minute 76, Everaldo (Kashima) strikes at Kashima Soccer Stadium but his header is cleared.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In the minute 78, Kashima to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In the minute 78, The away team replace Kazunari Ono with Shota Kobayashi.
Bin Ukishima is making the team's second substitution at Kashima Soccer Stadium with Sosuke Shibata replacing Mitsuki Saito.
Hiroshi Ibusuki is on a sub for Naoki Ishihara for Shonan.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Jumpei Iida awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 80, Jumpei Iida signals a Kashima throw-in in Shonan's half.
Yuta Matsumura is replacing Ryuji Izumi for the home team.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Jumpei Iida signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Shonan's area.
Ayase Ueda is replacing Kei Koizumi for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
In the minute 84, Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 85, Yuto Iwasaki is on a sub for Temma Matsuda for Shonan.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 86, Kashima's Ryota Nagaki is whistled for offside at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Important block from the Shonan defence as Juan Alano fires in a strike for Kashima.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Kashima.
Free kick Kashima.
Kashima's Ayase Ueda misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Shonan at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Jumpei Iida will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Shonan.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
That's full-time at Kashima Soccer Stadium. The final score is 1-0.
Kashima take a 1-0 lead thanks to Juan Alano.
